long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: XY Node POP is a Chrome extension designed to enhance navigation on XY’s platform by hyperlinking displayed nodes. When users open nodes within the platform, the extension automatically converts node references into clickable links, allowing for quick and easy browsing between interconnected data points. With this tool, navigating through XY’s complex node structures becomes seamless, improving workflow efficiency by reducing the need for manual searches and offering instant access to relevant nodes with just a click. This extension is perfect for users who regularly explore large networks of information on XY's platform.
